description.content: The Fading Star event is about to begin, giving Travelers the chance to win some rich rewards. Unlock Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus to further earn Intertwined Fate and a designated 4-star weapon!   〓Start Time〓 After the Version 1.1 update   〓Eligibility〓 Adventure Rank 20 or above   〓Battle Pass Details〓 ● Sojourner's Battle Pass will be unlocked by default every BP Period. Travelers can also unlock either Gnostic Hymn or Gnostic Chorus in order to obtain even more rewards, or directly
